item.title: Adding npcs to a list
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

You mean the continued int? try

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == #### || npcs[NPCID].npcType == #### npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####){

remember
|| = OR
&& = AND
post for more help =P

item.title: Adding npcs to a list
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

ok i was wondering if somsone would explain to add more than 1 npc to a code like this…

int NPCID2 = NPCID+34; System.out.println("Npc id =" +NPCID); if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; try{
i think it’s something like == ####) || #### || #### and so on… instead of adding up the list like this

int NPCID2 = NPCID+34; System.out.println("Npc id =" +NPCID); if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; try{ } int NPCID2 = NPCID+34; System.out.println("Npc id =" +NPCID); if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; try{

sorry if this is not understandible… ill try to explain better if no one understands.
